trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for the Data Encryption Standard (DES) algorithm from which all DES implementations must derive.
trans-unit.target: 表示所有 DES 实现必须从中都派生的数据加密标准 (DES) 算法的基类。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports a key length of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此算法支持密钥长度为 64 位。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A newer asymmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 较新的非对称加密算法，高级加密标准 (AES)，是可用。

trans-unit.source: Consider using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes> class instead of the DES class.
trans-unit.target: 请考虑使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>类而不是 DES 类。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>

trans-unit.source: Use DES only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.
trans-unit.target: DES 仅用于与旧的应用程序和数据的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 无法创建抽象类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Application code will create a new instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码将创建派生类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the protected fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm> class to the default values shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 此方法初始化的受保护的字段<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm>为下表中显示的默认值的类。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: |Field|Default Value| |-----------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>|64| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>|64| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue>|64|
trans-unit.target: |字段 |默认值 | |-----------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>|&64; | |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>|&64; | |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue>|64|</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the Data Encryption Standard (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 创建加密对象来执行数据加密标准的实例 (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) 算法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES> object that can be used for encrypting and decrypting data.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>可以用于加密和解密数据的对象。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 一个加密对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the specified implementation of the Data Encryption Standard (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 创建加密对象执行的指定的实现的数据加密标准的实例 (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) 算法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the specific implementation of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: 特定实现的名称<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>使用。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 一个加密对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is semi-weak.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是否为半弱密钥。

trans-unit.source: Semi-weak keys are pairs of keys that result in ciphers that are easy to break.
trans-unit.target: 半弱密钥是导致容易被破解的密码的密钥对。

trans-unit.source: If text is encrypted with a semi-weak key, encrypting the resulting cipher with the partner of that semi-weak key returns the original text.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本用半弱密钥加密，加密产生的密码与该半弱密钥的合作伙伴返回原始文本。

trans-unit.source: There are six known semi-weak key pairs for the Data Encryption Standard (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>) algorithm; this method checks for those semi-weak keys.
trans-unit.target: 有六个已知半弱密钥对数据加密标准 (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>) 算法; 此方法检查这些半弱密钥。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set a semi-weak key results in a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置一种<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>半弱密钥将导致

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A> is called to create a random key, a semi-weak key will never be returned.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A>调用创建一个随机密钥，永远不会返回密钥为半弱。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The secret key to test for semi-weakness.
trans-unit.target: 要进行半弱漏洞测试的密钥。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is semi-weak; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果密钥为半弱;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The size of the rgbKey parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 大小 rgbKey 参数无效。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is weak.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是否为弱密钥。

trans-unit.source: Weak keys are keys that result in ciphers that are easy to break.
trans-unit.target: 共享密钥的安全性是导致容易被破解的密码的密钥。

trans-unit.source: If text is encrypted with a weak key, encrypting the resulting cipher again with the same weak key returns the original text.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本用弱密钥加密的且具有相同的弱密钥重新加密产生的密码返回原始文本。

trans-unit.source: There are four known weak keys for the Data Encryption Standard (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>) algorithm; this method checks for those weak keys.
trans-unit.target: 有四个已知的弱密钥，为数据加密标准 (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>) 算法; 此方法检查这些弱密钥。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set a weak key results in a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置弱密钥将导致在<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A> is called to create a random key, a weak key will never be returned.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A>称为若要创建一个随机密钥，弱密钥将永远不会返回。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The secret key to test for weakness.
trans-unit.target: 要进行漏洞测试的密钥。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is weak; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果密钥为弱;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The size of the rgbKey parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 大小 rgbKey 参数无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secret key for the Data Encryption Standard (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据加密标准的机密密钥 (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) 算法。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `null` when it is used, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.GenerateKey%2A> is called to create a new random value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`null`时使用它，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.GenerateKey%2A>调用创建一个新的随机值。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.GenerateKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The length of the key must be equal to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>.
trans-unit.target: 密钥的长度必须等于<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports a key length of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此算法支持密钥长度为 64 位。

trans-unit.source: The secret key for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 机密密钥<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>算法。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the key to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将项设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a key whose length is not equal to <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置的密钥，其长度不等于<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a weak key (see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES.IsWeakKey*>) or a semi-weak key (see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES.IsSemiWeakKey*>).
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置弱密钥 (请参阅<> *1>) 或半弱密钥 (请参阅<> *1>)。
